sourcing.instructions: Co: Metal suppliers or online metal distributors; Er: Rare earth metal suppliers; P: Phosphorus suppliers; V: Vanadium metal suppliers; Y: Yttrium metal suppliers
steps: Co: Metal suppliers or online metal distributors; Er: Rare earth metal suppliers; P: Phosphorus suppliers; V: Vanadium metal suppliers; Y: Yttrium metal suppliers
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using an electronic scale.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, allow the furnace to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, allow the furnace to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
